title: Solr Admin Dashboard UI is completely dysfunctional on IE 9
description: As the attached screenshot shows, the Solr Admin UI Dashboard is completely dysfunctional running on IE 9. With this same Solr, I see all dashboard functions fine on Google Chrome.

comments.author: Alexandre Rafalovitch
comments.content: Could, as a workaround, a Google Chrome embed be added? I don't particularly care if IE is ever supported, but this could be at least a partial fix.

comments.author: Yonik Seeley
comments.content: Just to try and quantify the severity of the issue, I quickly checked the browser stats for solr downloads - it looks like IE is running at about 17%
